parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The ID of the region in which the resource is deployed.

You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~36063~~) operation to obtain the region ID.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The resource IDs. You can specify up to 20 resource IDs.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
The type of the resource. Valid values:

*   **PHYSICALCONNECTION**: Express Connect circuit.
*   **VIRTUALBORDERROUTER**: virtual border router (VBR).
*   **ROUTERINTERFACE**: router interface.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tags to add to the resource.
